Articles.Content: So, today I got the Tsiolkovsky Rocket Equation tattooed on my arm, and I was wondering if anyone here has KSP inspired tattoos. On a side note, the tattoo isn't entirely KSP inspired, as I'm currently attending school for aerospace engineering.

So, today I got the Tsiolkovsky Rocket Equation tattooed on my arm, and I was wondering if anyone here has KSP inspired tattoos. On a side note, the tattoo isn't entirely KSP inspired, as I'm currently attending school for aerospace engineering.

Holy smokes! I was just thinking about a Tsiolkovsky Rocket Equation tattoo this morning!

On a side note, the tattoo isn't entirely KSP inspired, as I'm currently attending school for aerospace engineering.

Be careful they don't kick you out of school for that. I mean, it's a permanent crib note
